summary: A mod for the roaming blacksmith or artisan, place a blacksmith anvil or custom smelter anywhere in the world!
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/VEXqfQz.png[/img]

[size=4][u][b]Campsite Smithing

[/b][/u]For the roaming artisan of all sorts! Place a blacksmith anvil or smelting pot anywhere in the world. Upgrade arms or armor anytime, anywhere!

[u][b]Introduction

[/b][/u]I had noticed that for Skyrim's 7 years of existence there had yet to truly be a user-friendly, custom set for smiths of all form on the go. I sought to change that with Campsite Smithing. Now you can upgrade anywhere, or drop preferred blacksmith equipment at your campsite!

[u][b]Use

[/b][/u]The mod is simple, simply drop the Anvil Chest and Smelting Pot into the world and sneak-activate to "deploy" them. Sneak-activate again to pack everything up. The Whetstone and Armorer Hammer can simply be activated (click or E) in the misc section of the menu to open a crafting screen.

[u][b]Compatibility

[/b][/u]This mod should be compatible with everything, and uses only data from the base game. Everyone can use this mod!

[u][b]Recommended Mods

[/b][/u]Other mods are only recommended but not required are:
[/size][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64798]Campfire
[/url]ï»¿
